A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Honestly I loved it. I'm a pretty big nerd\, and often find myself disappointed in movies that try to build out from a successful franchise. 
What I liked;
It stuck with the look and feel of the Star Wars series
It had humor but wasn't a running gag
Characters had depth - no one is fully good or evil\, and we find that good can create evil as much as dark can create light.
Hope and a change in regimes are the focus - which is refreshing. It allows for a new direction.
I love Rose. 
The visuals were epic.
